documents.document:
Membership benefit at European College of Aesthetic Medicine

The European College of Aesthetic Medicine is dedicated to serving its Members internationally by providing the some unique benefits. For more visit @ http://www.ecamedicine.com/membership/membership-benefits.html

Certificate in Aesthetic Medicine

The European College of Aesthetic Medicine offers intensive, hands-on practical courses and workshops in all areas of aesthetic medicine. Each module represents a Certification course, and can be performed on its own or together with other modules for those who wish to extend their knowledge and broaden their practice of aesthetic medicine. These Certification modules also count as part-fulfillment for the Fellowship in Aesthetic Medicine. Modules can be taken in any order.

Become an Aesthetic Medicine Expert

The goal of ECAM is to give doctors with all levels of experience the tools necessary to begin the practice of Aesthetic Medicine, improve their current practice, and become industry leaders in their cities and countries by acquiring the latest knowledge and most advanced skills in aesthetic medicine.

Aesthetic Medicine Training & Cosmetic Surgery Courses

Dr Peter Prendergast is a renowned cosmetic doctor and surgeon who has established several Aesthetic Medical Clinics across Ireland and the UK. He has trained hundreds of doctors all over the world in injectable and minimally invasive cosmetic procedures and is regarded as a leading authority in aesthetic medicine.

Sponsor and Exhibit Your Product

Exhibit and sponsorship opportunities are available at ECAM courses and workshops, ensuring effective exposure to your target clients—doctors beginning a practice in aesthetic medicine or those who already have established practices and are keen to learn about the latest in the aesthetic industry.

Aesthetic Medicine Training Institute

The European College of Aesthetic Medicine is one of the world’s leading training institutes in aesthetic medicine. The College was founded by dedicated European cosmetic physicians and surgeons with one simple aim: to bring to doctors all over the world an education and training experience that allows them to incorporate aesthetic medical procedures, techniques, products and technologies into their everyday practice and be recognized themselves as leaders in the exciting field of aesthetic medicine.

ECAM holds courses throughout the world for doctors of all specialties, who learn directly from senior ECAM faculty to ensure the highest level of training. Basic and Advanced courses lead to ECAM Certification. Master Courses allow doctors to learn advanced and specialised techniques such as body contouring, scarless thread lifts and penoplasty.

Aesthetic Medicine Training and Courses

ECAM's various courses on Aesthetic Medicine and Botulinum toxins for more about upcoming course schedule visit @ http://www.ecamedicine.com/component/courses/upcominglist.html

European College of Aesthetic Medicine is one

The European College of Aesthetic Medicine is one of the world’s leading training institutes in aesthetic medicine. The College was founded by dedicated European cosmetic physicians and surgeons with one simple aim: to bring to doctors all over the world an education and training experience that allows them to incorporate aesthetic medical procedures, techniques, products and technologies into their everyday practice and be recognized themselves as leaders in the exciting field of aesthetic medicine.

ECAM holds courses throughout the world for doctors of all specialties, who learn directly from senior ECAM faculty to ensure the highest level of training. Basic and Advanced courses lead to ECAM Certification. Master Courses allow doctors to learn advanced and specialised techniques such as body contouring, scarless thread lifts and penoplasty.

Successful completion of ECAM Certification and Master courses enables a doctor practicing aesthetic medicine to stand out from his or her peers and be recognized as a leader in the field of aesthetic medicine. Upon becoming a member of ECAM, doctors have access to senior ECAM faculty for follow-up advice and mentoring following all courses. This collegiate support and mentoring ensures physicians practice aesthetic medicine to the highest possible standards and are only available through the European College of Aesthetic Medicine.

Botox Training

European College of Aesthetic Medicine is world s leading institute for cosmetic training and aesthetic courses Courses include botox training, Fillers training, Q Med training, restylane training and radiesse training for medical professionals

Why Botox Training is essential

The medical practitioners have to be well trained & practiced thoroughly about the various aspects involved in the normal Botox training. It is very important to have a good knowledge of the right procedures, the health risks and precautions. A dosage in an appropriate amount can prove fatal for the patient. Therefore, it’s paramount for the medical man performing the Botox treatment to be knowledgeable enough about the right amount of dosage & the health hazards that may be born of an incorrect dose,or wrong application or an overdose. Since, there are possibilities of overdose & low dose, so the GPs must be known to the actions to be taken afterwards for safety purposes. As a precaution, it’s always best to apply the Botox injection in the right part of the face & with the right dose for avoiding any risks & delivering the best results. Hence, a proper & well carried Botox training is required for the medical practitioners.

Why to choose Cosmetic Surgery Training Courses?

Over the years trend of cosmetic surgery has grown immensely popular. Today, many people across the world prefer these treatments for the beautification of their facial & other body features. For this reason, cosmetic surgery has emerged as a great career option & there is a great demand for cosmetic surgeons. The people are well aware & educated about the treatments & its risks & so they also prefer taking treatments from certified surgeons only. Therefore, considering Cosmetic Surgery Training Courseshave become essential for the aspiring cosmetic surgeons for bright future prospects.

Why to choose Cosmetic Surgery Training Courses?

The field of aesthetic surgery is very progressive & offers better scopes of financial growth. Therefore, a large number of college pass outs, freshers & beauty experts are opting for Advanced Aesthetic Medicine Courses from reputable institutions for becoming trained professionals. Apart from the graduates, already established & proficient beauty experts are also taking up the Cosmetic Surgery Training Courses for studying & increasing their skill set as per the current trends & technologies of this industry. All the aspirants prefer to study the latest methods employed during the treatments these days for rendering quality treatments with safety. Becoming certified in aesthetic medicine actually fetches great opportunities for career & future growth.

Professional Laser Training Courses

Professional Laser training courses have gained immense popularity in a very short span of time. Its offers golden future prospects & therefore is a good career choice. The laser hair removal industry is active all over the world & is at boom currently. Pertaining to its scope & future growth, a large number of people including freshers, graduates & experienced beauticians are going for laser training courses. The current beauty professionals are learning the course to acquire specialized skills of the laser removal industry. Doing a specialization in the field of aesthetic medicine offers greater scope for career & financial growth.

An important thing about the Laser training courses is that there is no mandatory requirement for you to be a professional beauty therapist for applying or for getting admission in the course. Anyone having the basic skills is eligible to apply for a basic Aesthetic Courses .

Aesthetic Medicine & Cosmetic Surgery Courses

Aesthetic Medicine & Cosmetic Surgery Courses at European College of Aesthetic Medicine. ECAM Courses allow doctors to learn advanced and specialised techniques such as body contouring, scarless thread lifts and penoplasty.
